text: It was always about far more than a hashtag. Tarana Burke should be the first person mentioned in any article about # MeToo, the movement that has amplified a whisper network and caused ructions in the media industry that were well overdue. Burke, a civil rights activist, began using the phrase “ me too ” on Myspace in 2006 as a campaign for “ empowerment through empathy ” after she had spoken to a 13 - year - old girl who had been assaulted. People worry # MeToo has gone too far.
